data.sentence: The word فَلَا comes from the root ل ا and is associated with the meanings:

data.meanings: to ask/interrogate/inquire/question/demand/pray/beg, a thing asked, a question/proposition/problem/petition/request, beggar, that which is demanded or inquired into, asked, questioned, responsible.
data.sentence: The word السَّائِلَ comes from the root س ا ل and is associated with the meanings: to ask/interrogate/inquire/question/demand/pray/beg, a thing asked, a question/proposition/problem/petition/request, beggar, that which is demanded or inquired into, asked, questioned, responsible.

data.meanings: to cause stream to flow, repulse, reproach, flow abundantly, drive back, brow beat, chide, do in the day time, day, daytime, daylight hours (from dawn to dusk).
data.sentence: The word تَنْهَرْ comes from the root ن ه ر and is associated with the meanings: to cause stream to flow, repulse, reproach, flow abundantly, drive back, brow beat, chide, do in the day time, day, daytime, daylight hours (from dawn to dusk).
